content.description: Researchers studying the relationship between screen time and developmental scores of children in Canada selected a random sample of <math alttext="2,441" overflow="scroll"> <mn>2</mn> <mtext>,</mtext> <mn>441</mn> </math> children. For each child, the researchers recorded the child’s screen time, in hours per day, when they were <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years old (<math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"> <mi>x</mi> </math>) and their scores on a developmental test, in points, when they were <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years old (<math alttext="y" overflow="scroll"><mi>y</mi></math>). Higher scores on the developmental test are better. The <math alttext="95" overflow="scroll"><mn>95</mn></math> percent confidence interval for the slope of the least-squares regression line for predicting scores on the developmental test based on screen time was <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 0.13 comma negative 0.02, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.13</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.02</mn></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: The conditions for inference were met, and the researchers concluded that increased screen time is associated with lower scores on the developmental test. Which of the following provides the best reason that supports the researchers’ conclusion?

choices.label: This was a <math alttext="95%" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>95</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> confidence interval, which is a high level of confidence.
The researchers took years to complete the study.
The confidence interval for the slope of the regression line does not contain <math alttext="0" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn></math>.
The confidence interval for the slope of the regression line consists entirely of negative numbers.

content.answer: The confidence interval for the slope of the regression line consists entirely of negative numbers.
